                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      NormedCommGroup ((i : ι) → π i)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Finite product of normed groups, using the sup norm.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Equations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Pi.normedCommGroup = let src := Pi.seminormedGroup; NormedCommGroup.mk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Multiplicative opposite #

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      instance MulOpposite.seminormedAddGroup {E : Type u_1} [inst : SeminormedAddGroup E] :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      SeminormedAddGroup Eᵐᵒᵖ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The (additive) norm on the multiplicative opposite is the same as the norm on the original type.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Note that we do not provide this more generally as Norm Eᵐᵒᵖ, as this is not always a good choice of norm in the multiplicative SeminormedGroup E case.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      We could repeat this instance to provide a [SeminormedGroup E] : SeminormedGroup Eᵃᵒᵖ instance, but that case would likely never be used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Equations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • MulOpposite.seminormedAddGroup = SeminormedAddGroup.mk
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      theorem MulOpposite.norm_op {E : Type u_1} [inst : SeminormedAddGroup E] (a : E) :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ‖MulOpposite.op a‖ = ‖a‖
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      theorem MulOpposite.norm_unop {E : Type u_1} [inst : SeminormedAddGroup E] (a : Eᵐᵒᵖ) :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ‖MulOpposite.unop a‖ = ‖a‖
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      theorem MulOpposite.nnnorm_op {E : Type u_1} [inst : SeminormedAddGroup E] (a : E) :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ‖MulOpposite.op a‖₊ = ‖a‖₊
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      theorem MulOpposite.nnnorm_unop {E : Type u_1} [inst : SeminormedAddGroup E] (a : Eᵐᵒᵖ) :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ‖MulOpposite.unop a‖₊ = ‖a‖₊
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      instance MulOpposite.normedAddGroup {E : Type u_1} [inst : NormedAddGroup E] :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      NormedAddGroup Eᵐᵒᵖ
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Equations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • MulOpposite.normedAddGroup = let src := MulOpposite.seminormedAddGroup; NormedAddGroup.mk
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      instance MulOpposite.seminormedAddCommGroup {E : Type u_1} [inst : SeminormedAddCommGroup E] :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      SeminormedAddCommGroup Eᵐᵒᵖ
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Equations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • MulOpposite.seminormedAddCommGroup = SeminormedAddCommGroup.mk
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      instance MulOpposite.normedAddCommGroup {E : Type u_1} [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      NormedAddCommGroup Eᵐᵒᵖ
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Equations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • MulOpposite.normedAddCommGroup = let src := MulOpposite.seminormedAddCommGroup; NormedAddCommGroup.mk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Subgroups of normed groups #

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      instance AddSubgroup.seminormedAddGroup {E : Type u_1} [inst : SeminormedAddGroup E] {s : AddSubgroup E} :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      SeminormedAddGroup { x // x ∈ s }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A subgroup of a seminormed group is also a seminormed group, with the restriction of the norm.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Equations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • AddSubgroup.seminormedAddGroup = SeminormedAddGroup.induced { x // x ∈ s } E (AddSubgroup.subtype s)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      instance Subgroup.seminormedGroup {E : Type u_1} [inst : SeminormedGroup E] {s : Subgroup E} :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      SeminormedGroup { x // x ∈ s }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A subgroup of a seminormed group is also a seminormed group, with the restriction of the norm.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Equations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Subgroup.seminormedGroup = SeminormedGroup.induced { x // x ∈ s } E (Subgroup.subtype s)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      @[simp]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      theorem AddSubgroup.coe_norm {E : Type u_1} [inst : SeminormedAddGroup E] {s : AddSubgroup E} (x : { x // x ∈ s }) :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ‖x‖ = ‖↑x‖

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      If x is an element of a subgroup s of a seminormed group E, its norm in s is equal to its norm in E.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      @[simp]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      theorem Subgroup.coe_norm {E : Type u_1} [inst : SeminormedGroup E] {s : Subgroup E} (x : { x // x ∈ s }) :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ‖x‖ = ‖↑x‖

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      If x is an element of a subgroup s of a seminormed group E, its norm in s is equal to its norm in E.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      theorem AddSubgroup.norm_coe {E : Type u_1} [inst : SeminormedAddGroup E] {s : AddSubgroup E} (x : { x // x ∈ s }) :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ‖↑x‖ = ‖x‖

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      If x is an element of a subgroup s of a seminormed group E, its norm in s is equal to its norm in E.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      This is a reversed version of the simp lemma AddSubgroup.coe_norm for use by norm_cast.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      theorem Subgroup.norm_coe {E : Type u_1} [inst : SeminormedGroup E] {s : Subgroup E} (x : { x // x ∈ s }) :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ‖↑x‖ = ‖x‖

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      If x is an element of a subgroup s of a seminormed group E, its norm in s is equal to its norm in E.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      This is a reversed version of the simp lemma Subgroup.coe_norm for use by norm_cast.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      instance AddSubgroup.seminormedAddCommGroup {E : Type u_1} [inst : SeminormedAddCommGroup E] {s : AddSubgroup E} :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      SeminormedAddCommGroup { x // x ∈ s }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Equations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • AddSubgroup.seminormedAddCommGroup = SeminormedAddCommGroup.induced { x // x ∈ s } E (AddSubgroup.subtype s)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Equations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Subgroup.seminormedCommGroup = SeminormedCommGroup.induced { x // x ∈ s } E (Subgroup.subtype s)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • AddSubgroup.normedAddGroup = NormedAddGroup.induced { x // x ∈ s } E (AddSubgroup.subtype s) (_ : Function.Injective fun a => ↑a)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      def AddSubgroup.normedAddGroup.proof_1 {E : Type u_1} [inst : NormedAddGroup E] {s : AddSubgroup E} :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Function.Injective fun a => ↑a
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Equations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • (_ : Function.Injective fun a => ↑a) = (_ : Function.Injective fun a => ↑a)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Instances For

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Submodules of normed groups #

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          instance Submodule.seminormedAddCommGroup {𝕜 : Type u_1} {E : Type u_2} [inst : Ring 𝕜] [inst : SeminormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : Module 𝕜 E] (s : Submodule 𝕜 E) :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          SeminormedAddCommGroup { x // x ∈ s }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A submodule of a seminormed group is also a seminormed group, with the restriction of the norm.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Equations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Submodule.seminormedAddCommGroup s = SeminormedAddCommGroup.induced { x // x ∈ s } E (LinearMap.toAddMonoidHom (Submodule.subtype s))
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          @[simp]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          theorem Submodule.coe_norm {𝕜 : Type u_1} {E : Type u_2} [inst : Ring 𝕜] [inst : SeminormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : Module 𝕜 E] {s : Submodule 𝕜 E} (x : { x // x ∈ s }) :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ‖x‖ = ‖↑x‖

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          If x is an element of a submodule s of a normed group E, its norm in s is equal to its norm in E.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          theorem Submodule.norm_coe {𝕜 : Type u_1} {E : Type u_2} [inst : Ring 𝕜] [inst : SeminormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : Module 𝕜 E] {s : Submodule 𝕜 E} (x : { x // x ∈ s }) :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ‖↑x‖ = ‖x‖

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          If x is an element of a submodule s of a normed group E, its norm in E is equal to its norm in s.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          This is a reversed version of the simp lemma Submodule.coe_norm for use by norm_cast.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          source
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          instance Submodule.normedAddCommGroup {𝕜 : Type u_1} {E : Type u_2} [inst : Ring 𝕜] [inst : NormedAddCommGroup E] [inst : Module 𝕜 E] (s : Submodule 𝕜 E) :
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          NormedAddCommGroup { x // x ∈ s }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A submodule of a normed group is also a normed group, with the restriction of the norm.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Equations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Submodule.normedAddCommGroup s = let src := Submodule.seminormedAddCommGroup s; NormedAddCommGroup.mk
